shoe_name: New Balance Fresh Foam Hierro v6
pros: Comfortable; Super plush; Protective underfoot; Amazing lockdown; Easy to put on (heel loop!); True to size; Heel rudder; Looks amazing; Value at $135
cons: Heavy; Runs warm; Could be grippier
RR_verdict: A heavy-duty trail beast, the New Balance Fresh Foam Hierro v6 proves that it's more than capable of taking a beating from harsh elements! I found that it crushes everything underfoot and will last plenty of miles. I verified that it works best as a road-to-trail transition shoe and a light to moderate dedicated trail shoe.
awards: Top 25% in trail running shoes, Top 20% in New Balance running shoes
